body:
Comment 12: 
Nice work pinning this down and finding workarounds. Now no matter what happens, at
least there's something we can point folks to.

https://sourceware.org/gdb/onlinedocs/gdb/All_002dStop-Mode.html seems relevant. It
appears that it must be set after starting the executable, which can potentially be
automated (see e.g. http://forums.codeblocks.org/index.php/topic,10944.msg75540.html).
Not sure whether it is something that we could add to runtime-gdb.py or not. Also, given
http://research.swtch.com/macpprof, I somehow doubt it'll be supported on OS X, in which
case, I wonder whether the sleep workaround could be added to runtime-gdb.py.
